events.message: I received the wrong item and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible since this is very inconvenient.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to the customer receiving an incorrect product.
Agent John has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer regarding their incorrect order.
Hello! I'm John, and I will assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, may I have the order number and a photo of the item you received, please?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and I have attached a photo of the product that arrived instead.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund within 3-5 business days and provide instructions for returning the wrong item.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the clear instructions and look forward to receiving my refund.
Your refund request has been successfully processed. Please follow the return instructions sent to your email.
Hello, just following up to confirm you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
The case has been closed after successful refund completion and customer confirmation. Thank you for your patience.
